```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

Here set up

```{r setup}
library(IPCAPS2)

BED.file <- system.file("extdata", "ipcaps_example.bed", package = "IPCAPS2")
LABEL.file <- system.file("extdata", "ipcaps_example_individuals.txt.gz", package = "IPCAPS2")

```

There cluster
```{r clustering1}

res1 <- ipcaps2(bed = BED.file, label.file = LABEL.file, lab.col = 2, out = tempdir(), silence = TRUE, method = "mix")

table(res1$cluster$label, res1$cluster$group)

```

Here all methods
```{r allmethods}


res2 <- ipcaps2(bed = BED.file, label.file = LABEL.file, lab.col = 2, out = tempdir(), silence = TRUE, method = "pam")
res3 <- ipcaps2(bed = BED.file, label.file = LABEL.file, lab.col = 2, out = tempdir(), silence = TRUE, method = "mixmod")
res4 <- ipcaps2(bed = BED.file, label.file = LABEL.file, lab.col = 2, out = tempdir(), silence = TRUE, method = "meanshift")
res5 <- ipcaps2(bed = BED.file, label.file = LABEL.file, lab.col = 2, out = tempdir(), silence = TRUE, method = "apcluster")
res6 <- ipcaps2(bed = BED.file, label.file = LABEL.file, lab.col = 2, out = tempdir(), silence = TRUE, method = "hclust")
res7 <- ipcaps2(bed = BED.file, label.file = LABEL.file, lab.col = 2, out = tempdir(), silence = TRUE, method = "rubikclust")
res8 <- ipcaps2(bed = BED.file, label.file = LABEL.file, lab.col = 2, out = tempdir(), silence = TRUE, method = "clara")


```
